decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - 1/    The proposed vehicle crossover to a substandard parking space serving the front garden of the house, would by reason of existing facilities for off street parking 
at the rear of the property, lead to unnecessary parking at the front, prejudicial to the free flow of traffic on the highway and a hazard to pedestrian safety, is contrary to the     Policies ENV B 1.1 (New Development) and T 5.3 (Vehicle Crossovers and Hardstandings), T 4.4 (Road Safety) of the Unitary Development Plan.

             2/    The proposed vehicle crossover, would by reason of its position, 
                    involve the excavation and loss of part of the grass verge and 
                    a street tree would be visually out of character and obtrusive to neighbouring 
                    residential properties and detrimental to the visual amenities of 
                   the street scene and is contrary to the Policies ENVB 1.1 (New 
                    Development) of the Unitary Development Plan.
description: Installation of a vehicular crossover to existing house.
